game.description: A thrilling adventure awaits you as you embark on a dangerous quest to rescue the stolen treasure of the kingdom.
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen treasure and return it to the king.

tasks.description: Search for the hidden map in the old library.
tasks.objective: Decode the map to reveal the castle's treasure location.

tasks.description: Examine the crypts beneath the haunted castle for a possible lead.
tasks.objective: Uncover an ancient artifact related to the stolen treasure.

tasks.description: Track down the bandit's informer in the nearby village for more information.
tasks.objective: Derive the bandits' next move and plan your ambush.

game.title: The Quest for the Lost Treasure
